comments:
Build: I-20040518-2000

I imported a plug-in project as binary.
I then went to the label decorations preference page to turn on the binary 
decorators.  I got the following exception:

Tod: this is the same stack I caught a glimpse of the other day.

Here is the replicatable case

1) Import a project as a binary plugin.
2) Open the Label decorators preference page
3) Select the CVS decorator and enable it

the CVSPlugin will be loaded and then the update will be fired.

Now why anyone would want to use binary projects when my good friend Wassim 
has done such a good job with external plug-in references is beyond me...

Doug please resubmit this tonight so that my good friend Wassim stays as my 
good friend.
Tod, I think our friendship could survive an invalid thread access.
